original_text: If any woman who is a believer has widows in her care, she should continue to help them and not let the church be burdened with them, so that the church can help those widows who are really in need.
korean_text: 만일 믿는 여자에게 과부 친척이 있거든 자기가 도와 주고 교회가 짐지지 않게 하라 이는 참 과부를 도와 주게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: If any woman who is a believer
she should continue to help them
and not let the church be burdened with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 교회가 그들에게 부담을 느끼게 하지 말아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: so that the church can help
those widows who are really in need
